title: Man on the moon: epic journey of Apollo 11
creator_credit: Columbia Broadcasting System, Philip Scheffler and Joel Banow
brief_description: A report of the Apollo 11 mission to the Moon. Follows the progress of the various phases of the flight, including the landing of the lunar module, the first Moon walk by Neil Armstrong and Edwin Aldrin, and return to earth and splashdown in the Pacific.
